title: Dead World
description: I have been torn away from Earth…And now I must survive a dead world.The rifts of post-Cataclysm Earth have brought me beyond the In Between and into a world of bleak undeath.I have left my friends, my job and my world behind.But there is a reason I’ve been brought to this dead world. And while I may not believe in destiny, I will fight for what is right. Especially if it brings me back home.My name is Kat Drummond, and I’m a monster hunter.Dead World is the seventh instalment of the action-packed thrill ride that is the Kat Drummond Series. If you love urban fantasy that leans towards the dark and snarky, then you’ll love Dead World and Kat Drummond.
author: Nicholas Woode-Smith
